data.message: i bought an extra large sweatshirt from the gap it fit well the fucking sleeves are too long so its a extra large if it run small large in men rather if run normal really i dont know but if the sleeves were a little too long then it'll be a boyfriend thing but not all the time i need shit that fit. you got to work on your flow, your lines dont always link up listen for style then being so anxious to talk and make sure its clear it could be sabotage you never know, when i turn 40 im 39 now whats up with the flowers and dont get no more tatoos theres a such thing as too many, when i turn 40 i told god and this is for god too not just the boys, i need a new start a new beginning, what does life really mean for me, i dont have a talent before it was dance or just being the coolest mutherfkah alive all in my head trippin off life being off some whileout shit dont worry about what that means, im trippin im hot dont have any summer clothes alot of shit on my mind like how am i going to end up at forty without an high school and college degree, all those years on the road was a waste, too much to tell you but the spagetti thing aint no joke trying to make ebt (link) last, got the shit in the cabinet right now with frozen ground beef in the freezer thinking im shit of the same ole shit.
